SELECT o.name as platfromName, r.invest_amt,r.biz_time,u.user_name investorName,u.mobile investorMobile,c.user_name cfpName,c.mobile cfpMobile,a.city from tcim_product_invest_record r LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info o on r.platfrom=o.org_number LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on u.user_id=r.user_id LEFT JOIN tcrm_investor i on i.user_id=r.user_id LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info c on c.user_id= i.cfplanner LEFT JOIN tsys_mobile_area a on a.mobile = left(c.mobile,7) where 1=1
and a.city = #{query.name}
and DATE_FORMAT(r.biz_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.startTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(r.biz_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by r.id desc

SELECT * from (SELECT count(c.mobile) as personNum,a.city from tcrm_cfplanner c LEFT JOIN tsys_mobile_area a on a.mobile = left(c.mobile,7) where a.city is not null GROUP BY a.city ORDER BY personNum desc LIMIT 10) t ORDER BY personNum

select '2' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa=2 UNION select '3' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa=3 UNION select '4' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa=4 UNION select '5' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa=5 UNION select '6-10' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa>=6 and aaa<=10 UNION select '11-20' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa>10 and aaa<=20 UNION select '21-50' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa>20 and aaa<=50 UNION select '50以上客户' as customerValue,count(1) as personNum from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t where aaa>50

select '10万以下' yearAmount, count(1) personNum from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t where total_year_amount <100000
union select '10-20万', count(1) from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t where total_year_amount >=100000 and total_year_amount<200000
union select '20-30万', count(1) from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t where total_year_amount >=200000 and total_year_amount<300000 union select '30-40万', count(1) from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t where total_year_amount >=300000 and total_year_amount<400000 union select '40-50万', count(1) from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t where total_year_amount >=400000 and total_year_amount<500000 union select '50-100万', count(1) from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t where total_year_amount >=500000 and total_year_amount<1000000 union select '100万以上', count(1) from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t where total_year_amount >=1000000

select t.*,ifnull(u.user_name,'--') cfpName,u.mobile cfpMobile,ifnull(t2.total_year_amount,0) yearAmount from (SELECT cfplanner, count(1) aaa from tcrm_investor GROUP BY cfplanner) t LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on u.user_id=t.cfplanner LEFT JOIN (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t2 on t2.origin_cfplanner_id=u.user_id where 1=1
and aaa=#{query.name}
and aaa >5 and aaa <=10
and aaa >10 and aaa <=20
and aaa >20 and aaa <=50
and aaa >50
ORDER BY t2.total_year_amount desc, aaa desc,u.id asc

select t.total_year_amount yearAmount, ifnull(u.user_name,'--') cfpName,u.mobile as cfpMobile from (SELECT origin_cfplanner_id, SUM(yearpur_amount) total_year_amount from tcim_fee where 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.startTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY origin_cfplanner_id)t LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on u.user_id=t.origin_cfplanner_id where 1=1
and t.total_year_amount<=100000
and t.total_year_amount >=100000 and t.total_year_amount <200000
and t.total_year_amount >=200000 and t.total_year_amount <300000
and t.total_year_amount >=300000 and t.total_year_amount <400000
and t.total_year_amount >=400000 and t.total_year_amount <500000
and t.total_year_amount >=500000 and t.total_year_amount <1000000
and t.total_year_amount >=1000000
ORDER BY yearAmount desc, u.id asc
